MIN: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}
MAX: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}
ARRAY_MIN: {property} length needs to be at least {constraints.0}
ARRAY_MAX: {property} length needs to be less than {constraints.0}
IS_DATE: {property} must be a valid ISO 8601 date string
